* [School clousure during COVID-19](https://data.unicef.org/resources/one-year-of-covid-19-and-school-closures/)

* [Media availability at home](http://tcg.uis.unesco.org/survey-education-covid-school-closures/)

* [Change in education, ](https://data.unicef.org/resources/tracking-the-situation-of-children-during-covid-19-august-2020/)

* [Poverty level](https://data.unicef.org/resources/data_explorer/unicef_f/?ag=UNICEF&df=GLOBAL_DATAFLOW&ver=1.0&dq=.PV_LEVEL..&startPeriod=2008&endPeriod=2021)

* [Children able to continue learning](https://data.unicef.org/resources/remote-learning-reachability-factsheet/)

* [Other data on school closoures by UNESCO](http://tcg.uis.unesco.org/survey-education-covid-school-closures/)

* [Education data](https://data.unicef.org/resources/dataset/education-data/)

* [Statistical data - Out of school, etc 2019 TOP](https://data.unicef.org/resources/dataset/sowc-2019-statistical-tables/)

* [Keeping school closed education is lost](https://academic.oup.com/wbro/article/36/1/1/6174606)

* [Economical loss keeping school closed](https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/media/5b9b87f340f0b67896977bae/K4D_HDR_The_Contribution_of_Education_to_Economic_Growth_Final.pdf)

* [Economic and social benefits of education](https://www.oecd-ilibrary.org/docserver/eag_highlights-2012-15-en.pdf?expires=1620664564&id=id&accname=guest&checksum=36A8115B051CD4ACBA17D5AC892C6D79)

* [Meta-regression education-economics](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0305750X14002009?casa_token=xnMLVblbDVwAAAAA:NTGa1Qep0nzneSmanIMHsN-npJzN_01wTvGNHl4eg0YHywYKO5iiSlcIVoWAD-PuZHRJ1nussg)


## Data processing

* child in certain income group using [children count](https://data.unicef.org/resources/data_explorer/unicef_f/?ag=UNICEF&df=GLOBAL_DATAFLOW&ver=1.0&dq=.DM_POP_U18..&startPeriod=2011&endPeriod=2021) and [country classification](https://datahelpdesk.worldbank.org/knowledgebase/articles/906519-world-bank-country-and-lending-groups)
